message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.HC, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a novel approach for learning an optimal series of questions using Deep Q Networks for movie recommender systems. This involves using reinforcement learning to create user profiles to make better recommendations to cold-start users. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.AI (artificial intelligence) and cs.LG (machine learning), as the paper proposes a new approach for learning optimal interview questions using Deep Q Networks. The paper also involves information retrieval (cs.IR) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC) as it deals with creating user profiles and making recommendations to users. Additionally, natural language processing (cs.CL) may also be relevant as the interview questions may involve text-based inputs.
